import { formatTime } from "../../../utils/_helper.js"; import ModalView from "../../Common/ModalView.js"; import TimerCardListView from "../../CardList/TimerCardListView.js"; class EditModalView extends ModalView { _topParentEl = document.querySelector(".modal"); _parentElContainerEl = document.querySelector(".modal-container"); _parentEl = this._topParentEl.querySelector(".modal-content"); constructor() { super(); this.addHandlerModal(); } _generateMarkUp(timer) { return `
Edit timer

${formatTime( timer.duration )}

00

00

`; } addHandlerModal(handle) { console.log(ModalView); this.handleModal(handle, TimerCardListView); } } export default new EditModalView();
